title: Chicory and watercress salad
description: Chicory (also known as endive or witloof) is a wonderful accompaniment to richer foods, such as creamy blue cheese. This simple, fresh salad showcases chicory at its best.
ingredients: 4 Little Gem lettuce, leaves separated and washed
1 bunch red spring onions, finely sliced

method.Step 1: Mix the salad ingredients in a large bowl.

method.Step 2: In a small bowl, whisk the olive oil, orange juice and mustard, then season.

method.Step 3: Divide the salad between 8 bowls and drizzle the dressing over. Delicious served with or after cassoulet.
